Product Description

EASEPRES 6 Trays Desktop Document Letter Tray Organizer, Black

Perfect for Office, Home and School

The desk organizer is perfect for organizing and storing files, folders and bills to reduce the amount of clutter in your office, home or school.

Save More Space

Conveniently store and quickly access regular letter/A4 size or folders. Each tray is spaced 2.4 inch apart to accommodate a single ream of paper.

Strong & Stable Design

Made of sturdy metal with a black finish, this magazine holder boasts 6 tiers designed to hold magazines horizontally.

For Desktop Use

The office desk holder is capable of standing on your desk or counter top. (hardware included)

Item Type
Wall Organizer File Folder Mail Sorter Letter Tray Storage Baskets

Material Type
Wire Mesh Wire Mesh Wire Mesh Wire Mesh Wire Mesh

Color
Black Black Black Black Black

Desktop file organizer is great for holding Letter/A4 size paper, folders, binders, stationary and notebooks
Top 5 tilted trays for easy accessing document; the bottom flat tray is great for stationary, desk accessories, full advantage of your vertical space and keep your desktop clear
Mesh construction desk file organizer, frame is constructed of industrial-strength steel wire mesh, and reinforced with a solid steel frame
Easy to assembly with directions, screws and simple screwdriver are all included in the office organizer package
Mesh office Desk Organizer Dimension: 12.6”L x 9”W x 15.5”H

item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99 - $22.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:28 UTC – Details)



Aesthetic Design- Stylish rectangle shape with linear wire design, round edging along top rim prevents scratches. Smooth metal streamlines and rounded angles design protect your desktop from scratch. Stackable capabilities increase and utilize vertically-stored space to maximize your desktop workspace.
Stackable File Tray- Stackable design allows you to stack them together or put them to different places separately. 4 tier trays satisfy your need of sorting files, no worry about cluttered desktop anymore.
Durable and Sturdy Construction – Durable material and Electroplating technique give it a sturdy metal construction and smooth shiny metal outlook. Electroplating surface has the advantages of anti-oxidation, anti-corrosion, anti-rust, anti-wear, can effectively extend the service life.
Perfect Gift Choice- This Rose Gold Letter Tray is the most beautiful gift you could possibly give to anyone. Perfect gift for colleagues, teachers, friends. Elegant rose gold look lights up the personal home office space instantly, girls would love it.

Product Description

Sinboun is a U.S. brand which aims to provide efficient and functional work or home office storage. A brand who prides ourselves on the high level of customer care that we offer.

Sinboun organizer is committed to creating a functional, comfortable and efficient office or home storage solution for you.

Sinboun Desktop File Organizer

With a contemporary and elegant design this tray organizer will enhance your workspace and complements any decoration. Sinboun file organizer is a desk organizer accessory for your office or home, this desk organizer keep your home and desk neat and tidy.

Made of Strong Black Metal Mesh Ideal for the Office or Home Creative & Versatile Letter Tray With Handle Classical Look and large Capacity Easy to Install & Instruction Manual Included Round Surface Edges – No Sharp Corners

Multi-purpose Tray Organizer for Your Office or Home

Sturdy design to store any A4or letter size files, documents, folders, papers, stationery, mail, magazines, books and more. A great start to re-organise your current files and endless paperwork, use our desk organizer to increase your efficiency at work.

Paper sorting and storage rack has plenty of room for your documents and folders and is crafted out of metal, to hold more weight.The top platform, keep your documents and stationery in order.

If you want an office file organizer that blends in with any decoration, this 5 tier letter tray organizer is perfect for you. Sturdy design to store any letter or A4 size files, documents, folders, papers, stationery, mail, magazines, books and more.

The 5 tier letter tray with handle pull out trays of well-thought out dimensions that will keep the stuff you need organized, at hand.
Contemporary and elegant mesh construction with powder coat finish will blend in with any décor. It’s versatile and you can add to any space in your home or office.
A smart & practical desk file tray decorative and multifunctional will be a reliable helper for your families, friends, co-workers, etc, helping them get rid of messy working tables.
Made of high quality mesh steel construction with good touch feeling, and you can move it easily. It will hold all your files, folders, and papers.
The desk trays provide a great way to tidy any A4 or paper sized paperwork, folder, document, magazine with space for stationary & desk accessories. For use on office, home or school classroom.

Tips:
Before ordering, please carefully read the Size Chart we provided in the pictures.

Customer Service:

COMFY MATERIAL: This Christian sweatshirt is made of 95% Polyester, and 5% Spandex, super soft, and comfortable to wear. Sweatshirt fabric, moderate thickness, slightly stretchy, light in weight, durable. It’s necessary for your wardrobe and will keep you comfortable all day long.
UNIQUE CHRISTIAN SHIRT: Pray on it pray over it pray through it letter printed tee. Christian T-shirts women to show your faith in god. The letter graphic print shirt is durable and will not stick together or fall off after repeated cleaning.
VARIOUS MATCH: It goes perfectly with almost everything, you can simply pair it with your jeans, shorts, or leggings. Also, it is suitable for daily life, vacation, outdoors, church, casual wear, work, and so on.
BEST GIFTS: This women’s Christian shirt is a wonderful gift for religious prayers who have faith in Jesus. Also, it is a motivational gift for families, friend, or neighbor who loves sharing the good news of the bible and praising the lord.
SATISFIED SERVICE: We promise to provide quality after-sales service. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions about our shirt or service. We will give you a satisfactory answer within 24 hours.
